Speaking at a rally in Grand Rapids, Michigan, on Monday, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump praised James Comey for writing to Congress about the FBI’s review of Hillary Clinton emails.
Trump said Comey had guts for the move and jokingly thanked Huma Abedin and Anthony Weiner.

He also said Clinton’s election would lead to a constitutional crisis

• FBI director Comey may be under investigation for Hatch Act violation
